      • IADSchemataToString

        public static void IADSchemataToString()
        Prints all the schemata to the class PrintStream (by default System.out)

      • IADSchemataToXMLMapping

        public static void IADSchemataToXMLMapping(boolean useVoid)
        Prints all the schemata as XML to the class PrintStream (by default System.out) using void or simple mappings.
        Parameters:
        useVoid - true to generate a file with only void mappings

      • printVoidMapping

        private static void printVoidMapping(java.lang.String indent,
                    java.lang.String fieldName)
        Print the XML dump for a Void Mapping
        Parameters:
        indent - whitespace string used to provide indentation
        fieldName - the name of the field defined by this mapping

      • printSimpleMapping

        private static void printSimpleMapping(java.lang.String indent,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      java.lang.String comment)
        Print the XML dump for a SimpleMapping
        Parameters:
        indent - whitespace string used to provide indentation
        fieldName - the name of the field defined by this mapping
        comment - info text to be put inside an XML comment inside the mapping tag (e.g. type)

      • IADSchemataExpectedOutputSize

        public static int IADSchemataExpectedOutputSize()
        This method prints the expected size of all the defined schemata. TODO to be refined to return the size exp/max for each schema to allow file size estimates.
        Returns:
